title: Index Schema
description: An index represent the proportion of each constituent in a basket of securities or entities.

id.description: The unique identifier for the index.

date.description: The observation date for the data in this object. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

cqs_standardised.description: The credit quality step for standardised approach.

composition.description: Constituents and their proportion in the index.

reference_id.description: The reference item for the weight. (e.g. ISIN).

weight.description: The proportion of the reference in the index. It is recorded in decimal format.

name.description: The internal name of the index.

version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.
